r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d:
A PEAR-ified version of Useful Inc's XML-RPC for PHP.
It has support for HTTP/HTTPS transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: * Eliminate memory leak by resetting $XML_RPC_xh each time parseResponse() is called. Bug 4780. * Using socket_set_timeout() because stream_set_timeout() was introduced in 4.3.0, but we need to support 4.2.0. Bug 4805.
